Erling Haaland is making headlines again, but if you think his success is solely down to his goal-scoring prowess, you’re only scratching the surface. While most articles focus on his stats and record-breaking feats, there’s an untold story—one that involves a unique blend of tactical evolution, mental conditioning, and a support system off the field that sets him apart. To understand why Haaland is having such an extraordinary 2024/25 season, you need to delve into aspects of his game and life that go far beyond goals and assists.

Perfect! I've successfully reorganized your homepage to prominently feature your FPL tools article:

**Changes made:**
1. **First position in secondary stories**: Your FPL tools article "Revolutionary FPL Tools Suite: AI Assistant, Transfer Simulator & More" is now the first article shown below the main headline
2. **All other articles shifted down**: The Soccer Summer Series moved to second position, and Rashford's transfer news to third
3. **Enhanced styling**: Added a special gold gradient effect for the "FPL EXCLUSIVE" category badge with a pulsing glow animation to draw attention

The changes have been committed and pushed to your repository. Your FPL tools article now has maximum visibility right below the main headline!

- FPL tools article is now featured in the first position below the main headline
